settings.heading: When will my order be processed?
settings.row_content:
We aim to have all orders processed within 2 business days, however during busy times of year (such as Christmas or during a large promotion) it may take a day longer.

Our packing team takes a break on the weekend, so orders placed on a Friday may not start processing until the next Monday (or Tuesday in case of a bank holiday).

If you do need to make a change to your order or delivery address, please let us know as soon as possible!

settings.heading: When will my order be delivered?
settings.row_content: Mainland orders are generally delivered within two business days after the order is processed. Rural areas will generally receive their orders within 4 business days after the order is processed.

settings.heading: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.row_content: For express checkout, we offer ShopPay, PayPal, ApplePay and GooglePay. For standard checkout we accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, UnionPay, PayPal, and our digital gift cards.

settings.heading: Is payment secure?
settings.row_content: We take your security very seriously. All transactions processed on our site are secure and encrypted.
